actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to encourage State and local governments to provide relief from real property taxes for elderly individuals.
short_title: Elderly Homeowners' Property Tax Relief Act

summary.text: Elderly Homeowners' Property Tax Relief Act - Authorizes the Secretary of the Treasury to pay to the States the amount of any real property tax reductions allowed to the elderly by such States, plus a percentage of the reduction in inverse proportion to the tax rate applicable to elderly individuals. Authorizes to be appropriated the sums necessary to carry out the provisions of this Act.

titles.title: Elderly Homeowners' Property Tax Relief Act
A bill to encourage State and local governments to provide relief from real property taxes for elderly individuals.
